body: This issue serves as a reflective space to discuss our current status and future direction for the Trinity Trading project. It will provide a framework for instances of the AI to take a small walk, produce specifications, answer questions, and build the next instructions based on the comments provided here. Let's outline our goals, challenges, and the steps we need to take moving forward.
